visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average rainfall with the series name 'Rainfall'. Custom colors should be used for the chart and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a border and plot border with specified widths. The chart's background color is set to a light gray shade (#f9f9f9). The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title indicates the unit of measurement for the data (mm). Both axes have styled labels with a specified color and font size. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and contains the monthly average rainfall data. The series color is set to a teal shade (#008080). Additionally, the legend is enabled and styled with a specific color and font size. Overall, this configuration ensures a visually appealing and informative chart.
